name: Giant Cop: Justice Above All
description: Giant Missions, Giant Fun in pint sized Micro City.  You are the Giant Cop.  Use your size to your advantage to explore the open world, find hidden interactive objects and tower over the city uncovering a criminal plot that threatens Micro City.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-6400/ AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-6400/ AMD FX 8350 equivalent or greater Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 980ti
